entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS EVENING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH THIS EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 50S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE MID 60S AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOUTHEAST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
